name: Data Science-The Big Picture
shortDescription: Data science is transforming raw data, into action.
longDescription: This course will teach you about the tools, technologies, and trends driving the data science revolution
courseObjectives: Learn What is Data Science, Tools and Technologies
prerequisites: Good understanding of data and databases

name: C# - Deep Dive
shortDescription: Course starts with basic concepts to all latest features of C#. Provides all real world examples
longDescription: This course covers C# from scratch. starts with Object oriented programming using C# and moves gradually covering all features of C# from Version 1.0 to 7.0
courseObjectives: Understand highlights of C# language, learn how to write OO programming using C#, get good understanding of various features of C# like delegates, lambdas, collections, etc

name: ElasticSearch
shortDescription: Learn Elasticsearch from scratch and lay the foundation for learning the ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana).
longDescription: This course is an excellent way for you to quickly learn Elasticsearch and to put your knowledge to work in just a few hours! If so, then you have come to the right place, as this is the most comprehensive course on Elasticsearch that you will find
courseObjectives: Build a powerful search engine with Elasticsearch, Write complex search queries
prerequisites: Knowledge of JSON, any programming language

name: GIT
shortDescription: Git Complete: The definitive, step-by-step guide to Git
longDescription: This course is designed to be a comprehensive approach to Git, which means no prior knowledge or experience is required but students will emerge at the end with a very solid understanding and hands-on experience with Git and related source control concepts.
courseObjectives: Learn the key concepts of the Git source control system, Compare the different states in Git and compare between branches and commits, Create branches and resolve merge conflicts like a pro
prerequisites: Knowledge of source control and any programming language

name: Python
shortDescription: This Python For Beginners Course Teaches You The Python Language Fast
longDescription: This is the most comprehensive, yet straight-forward, course for the Python programming language. Whether you have never programmed before, already know basic syntax, or want to learn about the advanced features of Python, this course is for you! In this course we will teach you Python 3
courseObjectives: Learn to use Python professionally, learning both Python 2 and Python 3, Learn advanced Python features, like the collections module and how to work with timestamps!,Get an understanding of how to create GUIs in the Jupyter Notebook system!
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of concepts like Variables, Loops, Control Statements etc

name: Hybris Commerce 6 Developer Part 1
shortDescription: Hybris is an ecommerce platform which allows its consumers to sell in both B2B and B2C markets effectively.
longDescription: Hybris is an ecommerce platform which allows its consumers to sell in both B2B and B2C markets effectively. The Hybris Commerce Developer Part 1 training course teaches participants the fundamentals of working and developing the backend of an e-commerce application and also creating a basic storefront using a B2C Accelerator as the base.
courseObjectives: The Hybris Commerce Developer Part 1 training course teaches participants the fundamentals of working and developing the backend of an e-commerce application and also creating a basic storefront using a B2C Accelerator as the base.
prerequisites: Good knowledge in Java, Java EE and Spring frameworkn

name: Core Java
shortDescription: Java is a programming language and a platform. Java is a general-purpose computer-programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible. It is intended to let application developers 'write once, run anywhere' meaning that compiled Java code can run on all platforms that support Java without the need for recompilation.
longDescription: Java is a programming language and a platform. Java is a general-purpose computer-programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible. It is intended to let application developers 'write once, run anywhere' meaning that compiled Java code can run on all platforms that support Java without the need for recompilation.
courseObjectives: This course has been prepared for the beginners to help them understand the basic to advanced concepts related to Java Programming language.

materials.materialPath: https://lms.sonata-software.com/course/view.php?id=8

name: Behavior Driven Development using Cucumber
shortDescription: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a software development process that originally emerged from Test Driven Development (TDD). BDD uses examples to illustrate the behavior of the system that are written in a readable and understandable language for everyone involved in the development.
longDescription: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a software development process that originally emerged from Test Driven Development (TDD). BDD uses examples to illustrate the behavior of the system that are written in a readable and understandable language for everyone involved in the development.
prerequisites: Good knowledge in Java and unit testing

materials.materialPath: https://lms.sonata-software.com/course/view.php?id=293
